Group_alias

Superclass representing a group_alias entry in the database.

Properties

  • __table = ‘group_alias’ - table name
  • alias - varchar(64) primary_key not_null
  • group_id - int(4) not_null
  • modified - timestamp() not_null default_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
